name: El Taco Diablo
storyline:
Only your accuracy and speed will help you survive endless waves of enemies.
If your skills are high enough, survive and face "El Diablo" himself.
Compete against your friends or on a global scale, where every second matters.
Practice split-second decision making or just warm up before going into battle with your favorite action game.
summary: El Taco Diablo is a hardcore standstill arena shooter, with your trusty revolver and shotgun, defeat endless waves of UFOs and weaponized tacos. Earn your place as the #1 gunslinger with the most accurate and fastest aim ever seen.
